about.title: About Me
about.p1: Former small online business owner with 3+ years experience in Instagram marketing, SEO, and content planning. I have hands-on experience growing my own business for three years and completed several virtual internships in the social media field.
about.p2: Currently, I am an Undergraduate Informatics Student at UPN Veteran Jawa Timur with special interest in Website Development and AI Engineering. Active as Community Manager at Dicoding Indonesia and AI Engineer Cohort at Pijak x IBM SkillsBuild.
about.highlight1Desc: Dicoding Community Manager with 2K+ connections and active in various tech communities
about.highlight2Desc: AI Engineer Cohort @ Pijak x IBM SkillsBuild and Machine Learning Trainee at Indosat & DBS Foundation
about.highlight3Desc: Leading various Public Relations divisions and chairing campus organizations
